website_summaries.verdict: The TOMS TRVL Lite High features a sleek silhouette that is designed primarily for casual footwear use. Most have praised its modest and no-nonsense design. True to its name, this sneaker has been attested by many to be light on the feet. Considering its materials, it has a reasonable price tag. However, wearers have to be aware that this high-top most likely needs a break-in period. With its appearance and support features, owning a pair of Puma Hazard Orange Suede is recommended.
pros: Most of the reviews highlighted the stylish design of the footwear
The majority are impressed with the TOMS TRVL Lite High’s lightweight feel
A couple of commenters mentioned that it is durable
As per most buyers, the high-top TRVL Lite by TOMS true to size
One purchaser said that he was impressed with the quality of materials used on the sneaker
cons: Some wearers complained that the toe box does not have sufficient wiggle room
A customer implied that a break-in period is a necessity because the heel area feels stiff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I bought the black ones and they’re made of a different kind of canvas material that is sturdier than the burgundy pair I already have. The burgundy ones have lasted me over a year and I wear them almost everyday. The black pair seem even more durable so I’m sure they will last just as long. They give me the perfect amount of support. I walk a lot and my feet never hurt in these. They are by far my favorite sneakers I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Gyde

customer_reviews.title: Cute AND comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love hear shoes. The color is neutral and goes with everything. I get a lot of compliments. They are sooo comfy and great for work. I’d you’re on your feet a lot (I’m a teacher) these are awesome shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and food for walking
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, get compliments all the time. The raspberry color actually matches more things than you'd think. I wear a lot of Tom's shoes and felt this had more support than the other non sneaker Toms. I take long walks in these shoes
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Well made easy to clean and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. They are more than comfortable! The reason I did not give a 5 star is because I feel like the insert made my feet smell - but that could just be my feet and not the product. Either way I will absolutely buy these again. Also, I have washed them numerous times in the washing machine and air dried (take the laces out and insert out and toads everything in) and they are in rear condition! Definitely recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with these. I’ve worn the traditional Toms flats for years. This lace up style is great. Very comfortable and has much more support than the flats. And I LOVE the color. I’ll definitely order another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B

customer_reviews.title: Bummed out by this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Negative verdict on these. HUGE color discrepancy! Too tight. Did not fit as expected
customer_reviews.author: MZSAHARA

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes, run true to size but a little snug
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love love love these shoes! They run a bit snug from the sides but other wise they are true to size. After about a week of breaking them in they are feeling better! Looking to buy another color soon!
customer_reviews.author: AMP

customer_reviews.title: Too small with zero give
customer_reviews.text: I have classic toms and ordered the same size. There was ZERO way my foot was getting in this shoe. The seam in front of the laces was so tight with zero give.
customer_reviews.author: LJG

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as an alternative for wearing sneakers while at work. I work on my feet but needed something more dressy than causal sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsy Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes and so cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Very comfy and cute! Bought a 7 and true to size.
customer_reviews.author: SRogers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but had to wear them for a few hours to break them in. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Tamra Romo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fits exact size
customer_reviews.text: I get a lot of compliments. Comfortable and fits exact size.
customer_reviews.author: Riley R Vondra

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these shoes! I’m a big fan of Toms in general but these are so comfortable and I love the color!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Messin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this pair of sneakers. I really recommend to other customers.
customer_reviews.author: Belén

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are comfortable but did wear in pretty quickly as I walk ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are comfortable but did wear in pretty quickly as I walk on the inside of my feet. I'll likely put arch supports in them.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany O

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes to throw in a ba and go! Comfy and you can put in the wash too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute design, small fit.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, but they run small. I would order at least a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly, the color was exactly what expected. I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Will be returning because the fit is small and a bit uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: tittoe

customer_reviews.title: but adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Go up half a size. I ordered my typical size, but they're too small, but adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

product_meta.title: TOMS Men's Trvl Lite High Black Slouch Boots
feature_bullets: With every pair of shoes you purchase, TOMS® will give a new pair of shoes to a child in need. One for One®.
The Del Rey combines the inspiration of an athletic shoe with the friendly materials and style that TOMS® is known for.
Traditional lace-up closure with convenient rear pull tab.

Breathable textile lining and cushioned footbed. EVA molded outsole. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 11 oz Product measurements were taken using size 8, width B - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
